answers.answer: sounds like they are worried about preeclampsia. depending on how bad it is, they may try to induce but still most likely try bedrest first
Praying everything is okay. Good luck and keep us updated ;)

Everything was fine :) of course as soon as i was hooked up to monitors, baby started moving like crazy lol. They just want me to make an appt with my doctor as soon as possible and if things get worse to come back. The swelling also went down. Thanks for your prayers :)

question: So i had been swollen since yesterday in my hands and feet and today my mom told me my face was swollen. Also, little man hasn't moved today except maybe three times. So i called l&d and they want me to go in. What do you ladies think is going on? I'm 36+2 today. Will they induce me if something is wrong?
title: going to l&d soon
